## Services

Whether you’re looking for plumbing, HVAC, fire protection, electrical engineering, or energy conservation, EMCAD offers complete engineering design and construction support services. We work with clients through every step of the engineering process, analysing your needs and designing the most efficient and cost effective solution that works for you. 

## What Can We Do For You?

* New and renovation projects  
* Electrical services including LED lighting  
* Mechanical services including chiller/boiler plants, heat pumps, fan coils  
* Plumbing services. We are experts in the trouble free application of plastic piping in high-rise construction  
* Fire protection services including fully sprinklered buildings and standpipe systems.  
* Street lighting and power distribution design, including LED lighting  
* Energy conservation strategies, including LEED, Geothermal and Solar systems  
* Indoor air quality systems including energy recovery ventilation systems  
* High-Rise Building expertise  
* Construction support services. Our design/build background means added value services for our clients

## Projects in Your Community

Every building presents unique challenges – energy conservation, challenging retrofits, life safety issues, areas of refuge, smoke control measures, large-scale heating and cooling systems. Our expertise has grown to cover a broad range of commercial, residential, institutional and unique special projects.   

We engineer confidence into every project, from concept to completion. With 25 years on the job and more than 1250 projects across the province and internationally, we’ve built a reputation for delivering innovative and cost effective solutions.

## EMCAD - We bring buildings to life

No matter how well designed and constructed, a building doesn’t really come to life until you switch on the air, water and energy systems that make it livable. We engineer the systems that transform buildings into comfortable and energy efficient places to live and work.    

EMCAD Consulting Engineers is a mechanical, electrical and plumbing consulting engineering firm. We specialize in high-rise buildings and electrical, HVAC, plumbing and fire protection systems that incorporate high efficiency and sustainability. We deliver practical leading-edge design solutions to residential, commercial, institutional, and industrial building projects.   

We are building the future with a focus on the environment and innovative engineering and design. We’re ready to assist you with AutoCAD and Revit BIM design, and help your development [Go Green](/why-emcad/go-green/) or work towards [LEED](/why-emcad/leed/) certification.

## Let us help you shape a better world, and make a positive difference in your community.

## LEED

The LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Green Building Rating System® is a voluntary, consensus-based national standard for developing high-performance, sustainable buildings. It was created to define "green buildings" by establishing a common standard. LEED emphasizes state-of-the-art strategies for sustainable site development, water savings, energy efficiency, materials selection and indoor environmental quality.

Plumbing, HVAC and Electrical Systems are integral components to LEED Certification. 

EMCAD Consulting Engineers are currently working on a number of green building projects.
fields.title: Why EMCAD - LEED

## Go Green

Our commitment for a sustainable future is engineered into every one of our design decisions. Let us tap into our extensive experience working in LEED environments to help you go green.  From solar energy, to waste water management and energy conservation, we offer clients the best ideas from LEED to design your building with the same energy efficiencies and new technologies without the certification costs.   

## Let us show you how to green up your building.

* geothermal HVAC systems 
* solar hot water heating systems 
* solar power, renewable energy 
* energy recovery ventilators 
* rainwater recovery and recycle 
* motion-controlled LED lighting systems 
* variable speed pump drives 
* condensing boiler systems

EMCAD Consulting Engineers have engineered a number of green building projects.

## David W. Myles, P.Eng.

“Clients tell me one of the biggest concerns in our industry is over designing and the lack of reliable experienced construction support. I pride myself on delivering innovative but practical engineering designs that can be built on time, and on or under budget.

I started out in the business more than 25 years ago working in my family’s design-build electrical mechanical firm. I know what it means when something goes wrong in construction, and how vital a quick effective response is. I lived it. When you discover that a duct is running into a beam, you need a solution yesterday.

We engineer confidence and hands-on practical experience into every project. EMCAD provides a full range of electrical, mechanical and life safety protection services. We can assist in projects from the conceptual design stage right through to the administration of construction contracts.

> We deliver better, more efficient designs, and get the job done on time. That’s why so many developer clients have used us exclusively for more than 25 years.”
